00116 /*
00117 
00118      SAMPLE CODE FOR USING XiCathInterface.h
00119      =======================================
00120 
00121 The general structure of application code may follow:
00122 
00123    xiSoftwareVendor("<YourVendorString>");
00124 
00125    XiBool connected = XiCathAcquire();   // done at start-up, here in CCathPortTesterDlg::OnReconnect()
00126    if( ! connected ) { _report_device_not_present_error_to_user_and_exit_(); }
00127 
00128    for(;;) // repeat during iterations of the simulation model
00129    {
00130       xiCathQueryStates();
00131 
00132       XiControlPanelState ctl;
00133       xiCathGetControlPanelState(&ctl);
00134       // ... contents of ctl can now be used ...
00135 
00136       for( int cath=0 ; cath<=2 ; ++cath )   //for each catheter device
00137       {
00138          XiCathState state;
00139          xiCathGetState(cath,&state);
00140          // ... use the position information to update the simulation ...
00141 
00142          XiCathForce force = {0};
00143          // ... fill in the force fields as calculated by the simulation model ...
00144          xiCathSetForce(cath,&force);
00145       }
00146 
00147       xiCathFlushForces();
00148    }
00149 
00150    XiCathRelease();   // for a clean disconnection
00151 */
